procedural_fairness: granting leave to file a reply affidavit
considering if the evidence could have been available earlier
decision_reasoning: Prothonotary Hargrave did not explicitly consider if the evidence was previously available
cause_of_action: Dispute over procedural fairness and relevance of reply evidence in judicial review proceedings
procedure_followed: Motion appeal reviewed under discretionary orders of prothonotaries, focusing on clear wrongs or misapprehensions of facts
result_of_case: motion for leave to file reply affidavit denied
